From: Stripe <notifications@stripe.com>
Sent: Tuesday, 8 July 2025 2:59 AM
To: Sales <sales@kellycompany.com.au>
Subject: [Reminder] Update to WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway by 8 July

Get a modernised checkout by updating to the Standard Checkout Experience  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏  ͏ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­ ­







Hello,



This is a reminder that by 8 July, you need to update to the Standard Checkout Experience.



You are accepting payments with an older version of the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway. After 8 July, the integration you are using will no longer be supported, which means that essential performance and feature enhancements will no longer be made to this integration.



By updating to the Standard Checkout Experience, you can access a modern checkout with popular payment methods including Link, a wallet built by Stripe.



Make this required change in the WooCommerce Dashboard:




1.

Login to your WordPress Admin Dashboard

2.

Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments > Stripe > Settings

3.

Scroll down to the Advanced settings section

4.

If the Enable the legacy checkout experience setting is checked, uncheck it

5.

Click Save changes at the bottom

6.

Test the updated changes



If you update your plugin after 8 July, the Standard Checkout Experience will be enabled automatically.



For more information about this change, see our support page. If you have additional questions, please reply to this email and a Happiness Engineer will be glad to help.



- The Stripe and WooCommerce teams





Stripe emails you about important updates like plugin requirements. If you no longer use the WooCommerce Stripe Payment Gateway in your site, you can disregard this email.


This email relates to your The Kelly Company Stripe account.
Account ID: acct_1FcNNsDsEIKGgdbq
Need to refer to this message? Use this ID: em_gaeiqpkq5v2xuf1atwchi1jgco5j0b


Stripe, 354 Oyster Point Blvd, South San Francisco, CA 94080
